Text:
This is actually legit. 

I just ripped it into .avi so I'll be posting that soon. 

The video is of the stage production with no microphones so the music overpowers the voices a bit but if you have a decent equalizer you should be able to bring the voices forward more.

Avi rip is @
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5045434

Total credit given to ossprey

The guy who plays Voldemort is fantastic! I love him!! I had so much fun watching this, even if the audio and video are in times...questionable.

By the way, why is this ripped twice? As soon as the movie is over, it starts all over again - if it was just the actual show once it would only be 2 gigabytes or so.

It's not there twice. Since there's no menus most players will start over from the beginning when it gets to the end.

But, yeah, Joe Walker's Voldemort is really amazing. Him and Draco are my favorite parts.
Love it, but the voices are too low and adjustments on VLCs equalizer just makes it sound like crap. Can anyone help me out with that?

Unfortunately, the audio is not great on the original recording and there isn't a lot that can be done about that. There is a high quality version of the soundtrack available for free at starkidpotter.com.
Best way to fix bad audio is subtitles.... if this is so popular, is there anywhere we could find subtitles for it?
